Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1972...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/3/1983 to a 4-year deal worth $5,588,800 per year...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Second Base in 1984...
Injured on 6/7/1987 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
